name: The End (yr1crt)
description:
Instructions

--------------------------------

Download the game by following one of the two links:

Google drive: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B7VYEkAF1pRrZ0pnS...

Dropbox: https://www.dropbox.com/s/7lp2lv1dwkunpen/WindowsN...

Unzip / extract game

launch "THE_END.exe"

----------------------------------

Controls

W-A-S-D for movement

Mouse for selecting options in dialog
